input.sentences: the were a lot of fireworks in the sky last night .
i had a great time taking pictures of all of them .
some of them were very pretty .
there were also some that were too faint for me to capture .
some of the fireworks turned out strange on camera .
output.sentences: This was a good night for a lot of fireworks because it's such a clear night.
I didn't take a lot of time taking these pictures.
This last firework was kind of faint so I was unable to capture it with my camera.
I got a good shot of the strange fireworks with my camera.
